r.s: Mount and unmount devices in fstab
r.d:
System_Mount provides a simple interface to deal with mounting and unmounting devices listed in the system's fstab.
Features: * Very compact, easy-to-read code, based on File_Fstab. * Examines mount options to determine if a device can be mounted or not. * Extremely easy to use. * Fully documented with PHPDoc.
r.n: * Fix docblocks, use @var instead of @type. * Add simple example to class docblock. * Minor CS fix, 'false' instead of 'FALSE.' * Don't return from constructor.
